title.en: The Art of Refraction: PRISM-2 Spectrum

description.ko: PRISM-2 렌즈를 통해 빛이 생생한 무지개로 변하는 순간을 포착하여 광학 물리학의 아름다움과 수정 같은 투명함을 강조합니다.
description.en: Capturing the moment light transforms into a vibrant rainbow through the PRISM-2 lens, highlighting the beauty of optical physics and crystalline clarity.

prompt: A hyper-realistic 8k render of a PRISM-2 crystal structure showing complex light refraction, sharp rainbow spectrum beams cutting through a dark void, caustic light patterns on a surface, translucent glass material, cinematic lighting, high contrast, ethereal atmosphere.
